1、Enhance the user experience under a single
2、After changing the login user name failure treatment
upgrade the market trading system

Version 0.1.9 Updated
1.Fixed some bugs

1 Upgrade APP Wallet UI
2 Change Market Order auth
3 Add App Login History
4 Fix some known bugs

1. You can create wallet address now.
2. UI improvement.

HashNest 2.0 is here!

The new version of our APP and webpage are so simple and easy to use! You will find them a breeze!

We have FOUR new features to make your digital asset management so convenient:

1. Pay Easy! With our new electricity prepaid token.
2. Manage Easy! By logging in with your social media accounts.
3. Exchange Easy! The withdrawal function is now on APP, you can do whatever you want on the go.
4. Get Help Easy! A self-service Hashnest Support Page is here to help you 24/7.

We want to thank everyone for your unconditional encouragements and endless support throughout this journey. We know we couldn’t have come so far without you! As a celebration of all good things, we have a line up of awesome offers for you!

In this Version 2.0.4, we have fixed several bugs and added iOS 13 support.

We want to thank everyone for your unconditional encouragements and endless support throughout this journey. We know we couldn’t have come so far without you! As a celebration of all good things, we have a line up of awesome offers for you!

You can cancel your pending withdraw request and receive push notification now. What's more, you can get kwh gift when you buy miners!

HashNest 2.0 is here!

The new version of our APP and webpage are so simple and easy to use! You will find them a breeze!

We have FOUR new features to make your digital asset management so convenient:

1. Pay Easy! With our new electricity prepaid token.
2. Manage Easy! By logging in with your social media accounts.
3. Exchange Easy! The withdrawal function is now on APP, you can do whatever you want on the go.
4. Get Help Easy! A self-service Hashnest Support Page is here to help you 24/7.

We want to thank everyone for your unconditional encouragements and endless support throughout this journey. We know we couldn’t have come so far without you! As a celebration of all good things, we have a line up of awesome offers for you!

1. We support Russian, Spanish, French, German, Indonesian, Italian, Japanese, Malay and Thai!
2. You can see the real time market filled order now.

Final Sale! Enjoy more than 23% off mining plan prices and get free electricity token (kWH). Limited time, limited quantities, go get more with less. Don’t miss out!

1. We introduced the BTC55W Hash Token, you can check it out in the app.
2. We have changed the market depth from 5 to 7 in order to let you see all market orders.
3. Some bugs are fixed.

1. Fixed the transaction disappear bug after purchase BTC55W
2. We have improved the network connection speed.
1. Enhanced login security.
